cause.description:
This cause is not one that collects money. We will be collecting ideas to save our depleting environment. In most places our whole world is becoming a toxic dump. This is not good for our environment. We need the environment to live. Keeping what is happening to the environment now is like turning down the cure for cancer. Please join and share your ideas with everyone.
1. Our environment needs to be saved.
2. The environment needs to be perserved for every organisms future.
cause.mission: Think of and promote ideas to save our world.
cause.name: Saving tomorrows world, today.
